TopicTitle: Make fuel tanks that explode on impact. (Video Included)

Articles.Content:
Hello, all. I recently updated to 1.0.4 from 1.0 and have begun making a series of bombers. The bombers I'm making are using fuel tanks as bombs (I know about the BD Armory mod, I just like building my own bombs). My issue, however, is that my bombs aren't exploding! When they hit the ground they just create some black smoke with no explosions. Does anyone know why this is? I've tried a few different tank configurations (with/without Oxidizer, and letting my craft use or not use the contents of the bombs for fuel) all with no luck. If anyone could help me out here, I'd greatly appreciate it.

Here's a video I recorded to show what I'm talking about:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Dor71jZtLqA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
